name: Check the transition to the page my wish after clicking on the button. User is authorized
description:
This test will check that after clicking on the add to wishlist button,
            you are redirected to the My Wishlist page
            User is authorized
descriptionHtml:
This test will check that after clicking on the add to wishlist button,
        you are redirected to the My Wishlist page
        User is authorized
